How to Create an AI Center of Excellence for Enterprise

Organizations are investing heavily in artificial intelligence initiatives, and companies that have adopted AI report significant benefits. To deliver on AI's potential, it's essential to lead business and technology expertise within the organization, find internal customers interested in AI, and provide them with high-quality training data.

Key Concepts:

  • Creating an AI Center of Excellence
  • Investing in AI initiatives
  • Patience and ROI
  • Training Data
  • Stakeholder Buy-in
  • Integration of ML and traditional departments
  • Seamless API integration
  • Continuous delivery pipeline management
AI Enterprise Artificial Intelligence Business Technology DevOps Machine Learning Data Analyst Cloud Infrastructure Manager
